title: Type ID Cold Case Files: June 2009
content:
COLD CASE FILES: JUNE 2009

Do you have what it takes to track down some fonts from our cold case files? The ID requests below were all posted during June 2009, but never got a response.

If you can resolve one, post your answer on the respective thread and let us know back here so we can track the results.

How many can you identify? We’ll (re)start the clock at the date/time of this posting.

Ready.. Set.. Go!

Also see: [January 2009](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103080112/http:/typophile.com/node/65293) | [February 2009](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103080112/http:/typophile.com/node/65359) | [March 2009](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103080112/http:/typophile.com/node/65382) | [April 2009](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103080112/http:/typophile.com/node/65413) | [May 2009](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103080112/http:/typophile.com/node/65518)
